attributes.action: admit that Tony Blair misled the electorate when promising to serve a full third term
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Anyone appalled by the PM's reneging on his "I will serve a full third term" promise should petition Blair to apologise for his misleading of the electorate.  An electorate that did NOT vote in Gordon as a future PM.  Hardly democracy's finest hour...

rejection.details: This petition overlaps with several already in existence - http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=blair+
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
